channel.title: Garments – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The MkIV is the most competitive option for transmasculine folx. Designed & iterated upon by an FTM during his pre-op days, this is the fourth version of the product.

We’ve replaced the previous material with a higher spandex-to-nylon ratio without sacrificing the compression of the original design. This medical grade Lycra® is softer to the touch than previous iterations for a longer wear-time.

For the best binder for your body, please make sure to follow the sizing instructions before ordering.

The post Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Tranz* Forms Full Length Top Binder
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The ultimate shape wear for flattening the chest, hips and abdominal regions. This sleeveless chest compression shirt features a full length fit, covering the torso down to the hips, which can be tucked in. Uses moisture wicking, high grade PowerNet compression fabric and a specially tailored fit for flattening power, the S-1000 features a double panel front and single panel back. The double panel front is designed to reduce and flatten the appearance of the chest and minimize curves. The single panel back allows for less compression and reduced strain on the back, providing greater flexibility &comfort. This is a discrete undergarment designed to be comfortably worn under clothing.

  • Made from Golden PowerNet, a moisture wicking, high grade medical compression fabric.
  • Double panel front for supporting total chest and abdomen control.
  • Single panel back reduces excess strain on the back muscles, allows more fabric breathability, and increases overall comfort
  • Covered seams at the neck and underarms to reduce chafing and skin irritation.
  • Sleeveless, tuckable chest compression tank with a full length fit, covering the full torso down to the bottom of the hips.

The post Tranz* Forms Full Length Top Binder appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Sizing

  1. Take a snug measurement under the bust line with a tape measure
  2. Next take another measurement over the fullest part of your chest
  3. Again not too tight but not too loose
  4. Add the two measurements and divide by two and you have your size!

S [28 in.- 31 in.] M [32 in. to 35 in.] L [36 in. to 39 in.] XL [40 in. to 43 in.] 2XL [44 in. to 47 in.] 3XL [48 in. to 51 in.]

The post Tranz* Forms Full Length Top Binder appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Velcro® Waist Incontinence Pants for adults are a unisex vinyl waterproof shell lined with brush polyester on the interior that slips over incontinence briefs, liners and pads or adult diapers. Great for those seeking solutions to manage incontinence. Incontinence pants act as a barrier that offer an added layer of protection from leaks or accidents, giving the wearer greater confidence and peace of mind.

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The elastic waistband, adjustable Velcro® closure means these are a snap to pull on
  • Elastic bands are covered with brush polyester to prevent irritation to sensitive skin
  • The generous fit makes these especially comfortable
  • Comes in White or Blue fabric
  • Durable, washable and reusable
  • Hang or lay flat – avoid heat exposure. Do not machine dry or iron

The post Pull-On Elastic Waist Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Terry Bibs
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Our Terry Cloth Bibs are made from cotton on one side and a waterproof synthetic material on the inseam, making them comfortable and waterproof. Velcro closures make removal a breeze.

The post Terry Bibs appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Terry Bibs appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: AT Surgical Athletic Supporter
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
A-T Supporters are designed to protect, lift, and hold the testes against the body. This prevents strain on the cords and muscles during activity, helping…

The post AT Surgical Athletic Supporter appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• A-T Supporters are designed to protect, lift, and hold the testes against the body. This prevents strain on the cords and muscles during activity, helping to eliminate discomfort and keeping them away from injury.
  • Waistband- 3″ woven cotton/elastic mix for comfort. retain elasticity. Minimize curling at the top/bottom.
  • Leg Straps- Non-roll tubular elastic helps prevent binding, wrinkling or rolling.
  • Pouch- Soft, comfortable cotton-rayon gives you complete support.

 

Size

Small 26″-32″

Medium 32″-38″

Large 38″-44″

X-Large 44″-48″

The post AT Surgical Athletic Supporter appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: AT Surgical’s Protect Your Hip Unisex Briefs
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Protect Your Hip Unisex Briefs with Padded Hips helps to reduce the risk of injury from lateral falls. These unisex padded hip protection briefs have been specially designed with carefully placed inner pockets that hold closed cell foam hip protector pads in just the right place, which absorb the shock of a fall on impact. Great supplement to fall prevention programs for "at risk" patients as well as in sports by providing extra protection for athletes.

Available in four sizes:

Small (30" - 32") | Medium (32" - 34")
Large (34" - 36") | X-Large (36" - 38")

Measure around the waist to find the best fit.

The post AT Surgical’s Protect Your Hip Unisex Briefs appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Unisex padded hip protection briefs have been specially designed with carefully placed inner pockets that hold closed cell foam hip protector pads in just the right place, which absorb shock of a fall on impact
  • Moisture wicking breathable perforated cotton/spandex blend keeps the wearer cool and dry for maximum comfort
  • Helps to reduce risk of injury from lateral falls. Great supplement to fall prevention programs for “at risk” patients as well as in sports by providing extra protection for athletes
  • Contains 2 removable hip protector pads and 2 pairs of washable briefs for rotation. Unisex briefs are fully launderable. Remove hip protector pads before washing. Do not use bleach

The post AT Surgical’s Protect Your Hip Unisex Briefs appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Velcro Incontinence Pants
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
These vinyl waterproof underpants are shell-lined with cotton on the interior that slips over incontinence briefs, liners and pads or adult diapers. Great for those seeking solutions to manage incontinence.

  • The elastic waistband, adjustable Velcro® closure means these are a snap to pull on.
  • Elastic bands are covered with soft cotton to prevent irritation to sensitive skin.
  • Generous fit makes these especially comfortable.
  • Comes in White or Blue fabric.
  • Durable, washable and reusable.
  • Hang or lay flat - avoid heat exposure. Do not machine dry or iron.

The post Velcro Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Velcro Incontinence Pants appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: AT Surgical Hernia Truss Support Belt
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Hernia Trusses are made with a soft pad that applies gradual pressure and support to the weakened muscles of the groin with focused compression on the hernia. Designed to provide relief from an a reducible inguinal hernia in your groin - post or pre-surgery. The inguinal hernia truss will provide you with the support and comfort needed to maintain your active lifestyle.

The post AT Surgical Hernia Truss Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The Inguinal Hernia Truss is designed to provide relief from a reducible inguinal hernia in your groin – post or pre-surgery
  • Provides constant, comfortable and adjustable pressure to the hernia
  • Over-the-brief style of hernia support, worn inconspicuously under clothing – may be used while bathing or swimming
  • Get some relief from a reducible inguinal hernia with the inguinal/groin hernia truss
  • Easy to slip on and off
  • Made in the USA

Sizing (Measure around hips)

S (26-30″), M (32-36″), L (38-42″) and XL (44-48″)

Learn more about hernias from our hernia section on our Articles page

The post AT Surgical Hernia Truss Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
